buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-[#033F99] text-[#033F99] hover:bg-[#F0F7FF] font-medium px-6 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all

animated_stats.description: Numbers that count up from 0 to the target value when scrolled into view.
animated_stats.implementation: Use framer-motion or a custom useCounter hook. Format numbers with Indian locale (lakhs/crores) if applicable.

hover_cards.description: Cards that lift and show a 'Learn More' arrow or glow effect on hover.

trust_marquee.description: Infinite horizontal scrolling list of partner/client logos.
trust_marquee.implementation: Use react-fast-marquee or CSS animation with duplicated list items.

tabbed_content.description: Switchable content sections for different user personas (e.g., Individuals vs Enterprises).
tabbed_content.component: Shadcn Tabs with custom styling for the trigger list (pill shape).

faq_accordion.component: Shadcn Accordion with a clean, minimal border style.

sticky_cta.description: A bar fixed to the bottom of the viewport on mobile or scroll-triggered on desktop.
sticky_cta.classes: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white border-t border-slate-200 p-4 shadow-[0_-4px_10px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)] z-50 md:hidden

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Apply the 'Enterprise Trust' theme to all pages. Use white backgrounds, generous spacing, and the primary blue (#033F99) for actions.
2. Implement the 'Interactive Patterns' defined above. Every page must have at least one interactive element (hover card, animated stat, or accordion).
3. Use Shadcn components for base interactivity but style them according to the 'components' section.
4. Ensure all text meets WCAG AA contrast ratios. The primary blue on white is safe.
5. For the 'Trust Badges' section, create a marquee component using the provided logo URLs.
6. Add 'data-testid' attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
7. Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds unless specified in the 'hero_bg' asset. Keep layouts clean and flat.
8. Use the 'Inter' font family for everything. Ensure headings are bold and tight.
9. Create a 'StickyCTA' component for mobile views as requested in the problem statement.

universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure all interactive elements are keyboard accessible and have proper aria-labels.
universal_guidelines.responsiveness: Design mobile-first. Use 'grid-cols-1' on mobile and expand to 'md:grid-cols-3' or 'lg:grid-cols-4' on desktop.
universal_guidelines.performance: Lazy load images and heavy components. Use 'will-change-transform' for animations to prevent jank.
